definition: ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: Liu seven weeks flint go first, and confessed he must find out who is ghost.
sentences.chinese: 劉七讓周懦生先走，並交待他一定要查出內鬼是誰。

definition: to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
lit. beat the grass to scare the snake (idiom)/fig. to inadvertently alert an enemy/to punish sb as a warning to others
to take a risk out of desperation (idiom)
to conspire with sb/to plot/a conspirator/a partner in crime/an accomplice
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
unfettered and beyond the law (idiom); evading retribution/getting away with it (e.g. crimes)/still at large
frightening words to scare people (idiom); alarmist talk/reds under the beds
to turn a blind eye to
inside information/the ins and outs of the matter/how things stand/what's up
